ask=The short cook can give you a slice of honey cake, some candy, an almond, a baked pear, or some cheese.

create=candy/Generic:food:prepared:dessert:candy-marzipan/A short cook {puts|sets} {a marzipan|some} candy on a table.

create=cheese/Generic:food:dairy:cheese-slice-blue/A short cook {puts|sets} {a chunk of|a piece of|some} cheese on a table.
ask=The tall cook can give you a meatball, a beef roll, a mincemeat pastry, a pork pie, a stuffed mushroom, a cheese crowdie, chicken broth, minestrone soup or a roasted potato.

create=crowdie/Generic:food:dairy:cheese-crowdie/A tall cook {puts|sets} a cheese crowdie on a table.

ask=The cook can give you bread, a roasted potato, a braised onion, a sausage, a leg of lamb, a maple candy, beef stew or some cheese.
create=candy/Generic:food:prepared:dessert:candy-maple/The cook {puts|sets} a maple candy on the sideboard.
create=bread/Generic:food:bread:roll/The cook {puts|sets} a {fresh |}bread roll on the sideboard.
create=onion/Generic:food:vegetable:onion-braised/The cook {puts|sets} {a freshly braised|an} onion on the sideboard.
create=cheese/Generic:food:dairy:cheese-chunk-white/The cook {puts|sets} {a chunk of|a piece of|some} cheese on the sideboard.
create=lamb/Generic:food:meat:lamb-leg/The cook {puts|sets} {a leg of|a piece of|some} lamb on the sideboard.
create=sausage/Generic:food:meat:sausage-generic/The cook {puts|sets} {an entire|a|some} sausage on the sideboard.
create=stew/Generic:food:soup:bowl-stew-beef/The cook {puts|sets} a bowl of beef stew on the sideboard.
